SEARCH
Module org.jnetpcap
Package org.jnetpcap

Class PcapHeader

java.lang.Object
org.jnetpcap.PcapHeader
public class PcapHeader extends Object
PcapHeader relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • PcapHeader refers to one or more preview APIs: MemoryAddress, MemorySegment, MemorySession.
Programs can only use PcapHeader when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
Author:
Sly Technologies Inc, repos@slytechs.com, Mark Bednarczyk
